app.description: Creates a graph from Pubmed and Authors' Orcid identifiers

option.name: derbyFilePath
option.description: REQUIRED. path to Derby database storage directory.

option.name: actionStr
option.description: REQUIRED. action to perform. 'pmid': specify one or more Pubmed identifiers (PMID) to insert

option.name: maxDepth
option.description: max depth for of searching. -1: infinite
